items.name: Skyline Terrace & Lounge
items.short_description: Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of Mombasa's skyline and the Indian Ocean from this chic rooftop lounge. Perfect for sundowners and sophisticated evenings.
items.address: Moi Avenue, Central Business District, Mombasa

items.name: Mombasa Oceanarium & Discovery Center
items.short_description: An interactive center dedicated to marine conservation, featuring touch pools, educational exhibits, and a large aquarium showcasing East Africa's vibrant underwater ecosystem.
items.address: Mama Ngina Waterfront Park, Likoni, Mombasa

items.name: Jungle Canopy Zipline & Adventure Park
items.short_description: Thrilling zipline courses, canopy walks, and obstacle challenges set amidst a lush coastal forest. An adrenaline-pumping experience for all ages.
items.address: Diani Road, South Coast (near Ukunda), Mombasa

items.name: Pwani Contemporary Art Gallery
items.short_description: Discover emerging and established East African artists in this vibrant gallery space. Features rotating exhibitions, workshops, and a gift shop with unique local crafts.

items.name: Kilindini Floating Bites
items.short_description: Experience Mombasa's culinary scene aboard a unique floating platform. Enjoy fresh seafood, local delicacies, and live music with stunning harbor views.
items.address: Kilindini Harbour, Near Likoni Ferry Terminal, Mombasa

items.name: Dolphin Bay Beach Club
items.short_description: A vibrant beach club offering watersports, beachfront dining, and live entertainment. Relax by the ocean, try jet-skiing, or simply soak up the sun.

items.name: Old Town Echoes Museum & Trail
items.short_description: An immersive experience blending augmented reality and traditional exhibits to bring Mombasa's Old Town history to life. Follow a self-guided trail with interactive points.
items.address: Fort Jesus Road, Old Town, Mombasa

items.name: Coastline Harvest Farm & Kitchen
items.short_description: A sustainable organic farm offering tours, cooking classes using fresh produce, and a farm-to-table restaurant. Learn about local agriculture and taste authentic Swahili flavors.

items.name: Funky Town Family Entertainment Centre
items.short_description: Mombasa's largest indoor family entertainment centre featuring arcade games, laser tag, soft play areas, and a mini-golf course. Fun for kids and adults alike.

items.name: Serene Sands Wellness Retreat
items.short_description: A tranquil escape offering luxurious spa treatments, yoga classes by the beach, and healthy dining options. Rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul in a peaceful coastal setting.
